title: Emissary, Part I
synopsis: Commander Benjamin Sisko takes command of Deep Space Nine and encounters a mysterious alien race in the Bajoran wormhole.

title: Emissary, Part II
synopsis: Sisko continues to explore the mysterious wormhole while the station faces a Bajoran extremist attack.

title: Past Prologue
synopsis: Kira must decide where her loyalties lie when a Bajoran terrorist seeks asylum on the station.

title: A Man Alone
synopsis: Odo becomes the prime suspect in a murder investigation when a man he once imprisoned is found dead.

title: Babel
synopsis: A virus that affects the ability to communicate spreads through the station, leading to chaos.

title: Captive Pursuit
synopsis: O'Brien befriends an alien who is being hunted for sport and must decide whether to help him escape.

title: Q-Less
synopsis: The station is visited by Vash and the omnipotent Q, leading to strange occurrences and a power drain.

title: Dax
synopsis: Jadzia Dax is accused of murder, forcing Sisko and the crew to defend her and uncover the truth about the crime.

title: The Passenger
synopsis: The consciousness of a notorious criminal takes over Dr. Bashir, leading to a deadly confrontation.

title: Move Along Home
synopsis: The crew becomes trapped in a deadly game played by visitors from the Gamma Quadrant.

title: The Nagus
synopsis: Quark is unexpectedly named the successor to the Grand Nagus, the leader of the Ferengi Alliance.

title: Vortex
synopsis: Odo forms an unlikely bond with a criminal who claims to have information about others of Odo's kind.

title: Battle Lines
synopsis: Sisko, Kira, and Bashir crash-land on a planet where two factions are locked in an eternal war.

title: The Storyteller
synopsis: O'Brien is declared the successor to a village's spiritual leader who protects them from a mythical beast.

title: Progress
synopsis: Kira struggles with her loyalty to Bajor when she is ordered to evict a stubborn farmer from his land.

title: If Wishes Were Horses
synopsis: The crew's fantasies come to life when mysterious energy beings visit the station.

title: The Forsaken
synopsis: Lwaxana Troi visits the station and becomes infatuated with Odo while an alien probe causes problems.

title: Dramatis Personae
synopsis: A telepathic matrix infects the crew, causing them to act out an ancient power struggle.

title: Duet
synopsis: Kira confronts a Cardassian who claims to have been a war criminal during the occupation of Bajor.

title: In the Hands of the Prophets
synopsis: A Bajoran religious leader opposes the Federation's teachings on the station, leading to political tension.

title: The Homecoming
synopsis: Kira and O'Brien rescue a Bajoran hero from a Cardassian prison camp, sparking political turmoil on Bajor.

title: The Circle
synopsis: A Bajoran extremist group threatens to overthrow the provisional government, forcing Sisko to consider the Federation's role on the station.

title: The Siege
synopsis: As the Circle stages a coup on Bajor, Sisko and the crew must defend the station and prevent the Federation from being expelled.

title: Invasive Procedures
synopsis: A group of mercenaries takes over the station to steal the symbiont from Jadzia Dax.

title: Cardassians
synopsis: A political scandal erupts when a Cardassian boy, adopted by Bajorans, is claimed by his biological father.

title: Melora
synopsis: Dr. Bashir falls for a visiting Elaysian officer, who must use a wheelchair due to her species' adaptation to low gravity.

title: Rules of Acquisition
synopsis: Quark is sent to negotiate a business deal in the Gamma Quadrant, unaware that one of his employees is a female Ferengi disguised as a male.

title: Necessary Evil
synopsis: Odo reopens a five-year-old murder case, leading to revelations about his past and his relationship with Kira.

title: Second Sight
synopsis: Sisko falls for a mysterious woman who only appears at night, leading to a shocking revelation about her true identity.

title: Sanctuary
synopsis: A group of refugees from the Gamma Quadrant arrives on the station, seeking a new home on Bajor.

title: Rivals
synopsis: A con artist opens a competing bar on the station, using a mysterious device that brings him good luck at Quark's expense.

title: The Alternate
synopsis: Odo's mentor arrives on the station with evidence that may reveal Odo's origins, but the discovery leads to unexpected consequences.

title: Armageddon Game
synopsis: Bashir and O'Brien are marked for death after helping two warring species destroy a deadly biological weapon.

title: Whispers
synopsis: O'Brien returns to the station, only to discover that everyone is treating him with suspicion and fear.

title: Paradise
synopsis: Sisko and O'Brien are stranded on a planet where the inhabitants have rejected technology, and the leader uses coercion to enforce her ideology.

title: Shadowplay
synopsis: Odo and Dax investigate the mysterious disappearances of villagers on a remote planet in the Gamma Quadrant.

title: Playing God
synopsis: Jadzia mentors a Trill initiate while the station faces a crisis involving a growing proto-universe.

title: Profit and Loss
synopsis: Quark is reunited with a former lover who is now a political fugitive, forcing him to choose between love and profit.

title: Blood Oath
synopsis: Jadzia Dax honors a blood oath made by Curzon Dax to help three aging Klingons seek revenge against their old enemy.

title: The Maquis, Part I
synopsis: A group of Federation colonists form a resistance movement against the Cardassians, leading to a conflict with the crew.

title: The Maquis, Part II
synopsis: Sisko faces a moral dilemma as he tries to stop the Maquis from igniting a war with the Cardassians.

title: The Wire
synopsis: Garak suffers from a severe addiction to a brain implant, leading Bashir to discover dark secrets about his past.

title: Crossover
synopsis: Kira and Bashir find themselves in a parallel universe where the Bajorans rule over the oppressed Terrans.

title: The Collaborator
synopsis: Kira investigates a Bajoran official who is accused of collaborating with the Cardassians during the occupation.

title: Tribunal
synopsis: O'Brien is arrested by the Cardassians and put on trial for a crime he did not commit, leading to a tense legal battle.

title: The Jem'Hadar
synopsis: Sisko and Quark are captured by the Dominion, a powerful new threat from the Gamma Quadrant, marking the beginning of a new conflict.

title: The Search, Part I
synopsis: Sisko takes the Defiant into the Gamma Quadrant to find the leaders of the Dominion and prevent a war.

title: The Search, Part II
synopsis: Sisko and the crew discover the shocking truth about the Founders of the Dominion.

title: The House of Quark
synopsis: Quark becomes embroiled in Klingon politics when he accidentally kills a Klingon warrior in self-defense.

title: Equilibrium
synopsis: Jadzia Dax experiences disturbing hallucinations, leading her to uncover a hidden secret from a previous host.

title: Second Skin
synopsis: Kira is abducted by the Cardassians and made to believe she is one of them as part of an elaborate psychological ploy.

title: The Abandoned
synopsis: Odo takes responsibility for a Jem'Hadar child found on the station and struggles with the boy's violent nature.

title: Civil Defense
synopsis: An old Cardassian security program traps the crew inside the station, triggering deadly automatic defenses.

title: Meridian
synopsis: Jadzia Dax falls in love with a man from a planet that phases in and out of existence.

title: Defiant
synopsis: Riker's duplicate from the Enterprise steals the Defiant and plans to use it to start a war between the Federation and the Cardassians.

title: Fascination
synopsis: Lwaxana Troi visits the station and inadvertently causes the crew to experience intense romantic feelings.

title: Past Tense, Part I
synopsis: Sisko, Bashir, and Dax are transported to 21st-century Earth, where they become involved in a historic event that will shape the future.

title: Past Tense, Part II
synopsis: Sisko takes on the role of a historic figure to prevent the future from being altered, while Dax and Bashir work to find a way back to their time.

title: Life Support
synopsis: Bashir struggles to save Vedek Bareil's life after a critical accident, but the cost of his survival may be too high.

title: Heart of Stone
synopsis: Kira becomes trapped in a crystal formation that is slowly killing her, while Odo is forced to confront his feelings for her.

title: Destiny
synopsis: Sisko must navigate a delicate diplomatic situation when a Cardassian delegation arrives to help set up a subspace relay, but a Bajoran prophecy predicts disaster.

title: Prophet Motive
synopsis: Quark is shocked when Grand Nagus Zek undergoes a sudden transformation into a benevolent leader.

title: Visionary
synopsis: O'Brien experiences time shifts that allow him to see glimpses of the future, including his own death.

title: Distant Voices
synopsis: After being attacked by an alien, Bashir finds himself in a dreamlike version of the station, where he must confront his deepest fears.

title: Through the Looking Glass
synopsis: Sisko is abducted into the Mirror Universe, where he must take on the role of his counterpart and lead a rebellion against the Alliance.

title: Improbable Cause
synopsis: Garak's shop is bombed, leading Odo to uncover a complex web of deceit involving the Tal Shiar and the Obsidian Order.

title: The Die is Cast
synopsis: Garak and Odo are caught in the middle of a joint Romulan-Cardassian attack on the Dominion, which leads to disastrous consequences.

title: Explorers
synopsis: Sisko and Jake build an ancient Bajoran lightship and set sail on a journey to discover if Bajorans could have reached Cardassia in the past.

title: Family Business
synopsis: Quark returns to Ferenginar to confront his mother, who has been breaking the law by earning profit.

title: Shakaar
synopsis: Kira is torn between her duty to Bajor and her loyalty to an old resistance comrade when she is sent to retrieve farming equipment from him.

title: Facets
synopsis: Jadzia Dax undergoes the Trill zhian'tara ritual, allowing her to meet the previous hosts of her symbiont.

title: The Adversary
synopsis: Sisko becomes a captain and takes the Defiant on a mission to prevent a war, but a Changeling infiltrates the crew.

title: The Way of the Warrior, Part I
synopsis: Worf arrives on Deep Space Nine as the Klingons threaten war, and Sisko must prevent a galactic conflict.

title: The Way of the Warrior, Part II
synopsis: As tensions escalate, Sisko and Worf face off against the Klingon fleet in a battle to protect the station and Bajor.

title: The Visitor
synopsis: An elderly Jake Sisko tells the story of how he lost his father to a temporal anomaly and spent his life trying to save him.

title: Hippocratic Oath
synopsis: Bashir and O'Brien are captured by a group of Jem'Hadar who want Bashir to cure their addiction to Ketracel-white.

title: Indiscretion
synopsis: Kira and Gul Dukat team up to search for a lost Cardassian ship, leading to a confrontation over a dark secret.

title: Rejoined
synopsis: Jadzia Dax is reunited with a former lover who is now joined to a new Trill host, leading to a difficult choice about their future.

title: Starship Down
synopsis: The Defiant is heavily damaged in the atmosphere of a gas giant while negotiating with the Karemma, leading to a battle for survival.

title: Little Green Men
synopsis: Quark, Rom, and Nog are accidentally sent back in time to 1947 Roswell, New Mexico, where they are mistaken for aliens.

title: The Sword of Kahless
synopsis: Worf, Dax, and Kor search for a legendary Klingon artifact that could unite the Empire, but are torn apart by greed and ambition.

title: Our Man Bashir
synopsis: Bashir's holodeck spy fantasy becomes a deadly reality when a transporter accident places the crew's lives in his hands.

title: Homefront
synopsis: Sisko is called back to Earth to deal with a security crisis after a bombing is blamed on the Dominion, leading to the imposition of martial law.

title: Paradise Lost
synopsis: Sisko uncovers a conspiracy within Starfleet to seize power in the name of security, forcing him to make a difficult decision.

title: Crossfire
synopsis: Odo struggles with his feelings for Kira when he is assigned to protect Shakaar, Bajor's First Minister.

title: Return to Grace
synopsis: Kira and Dukat form an uneasy alliance to track down a Klingon ship, but Dukat's personal ambitions lead to a dangerous confrontation.

title: Sons of Mogh
synopsis: Worf's brother Kurn comes to him seeking a death ritual, but Worf must find another way to restore his brother's honor.

title: Bar Association
synopsis: Rom leads a labor strike against Quark's bar, challenging the exploitation of workers under Ferengi law.

title: Accession
synopsis: A Bajoran from the past emerges from the wormhole and claims to be the Emissary, challenging Sisko's role and faith.

title: Rules of Engagement
synopsis: Worf faces a court martial after he accidentally destroys a civilian ship during a battle with the Klingons.

title: Hard Time
synopsis: O'Brien is released after serving a virtual prison sentence that has left him psychologically scarred.

title: Shattered Mirror
synopsis: Sisko is lured back to the Mirror Universe by his counterpart's son, who needs his help to build a new Defiant.

title: The Muse
synopsis: Jake Sisko is inspired by a mysterious alien woman to write a novel, but the process comes at a dangerous cost.

title: For the Cause
synopsis: Sisko faces betrayal from within his own ranks when he discovers that a close friend is working with the Maquis.

title: To the Death
synopsis: Sisko teams up with Jem'Hadar soldiers to stop a rogue group from using an ancient Iconian gateway to gain power.

title: The Quickening
synopsis: Bashir tries to cure a deadly plague inflicted by the Dominion on a planet, but his efforts are met with resistance and despair.

title: Body Parts
synopsis: Quark believes he is dying and sells his remains, only to find out that he has been misdiagnosed, leading to a desperate plan to avoid paying up.

title: Broken Link
synopsis: Odo's body begins to break down, forcing him to return to the Founders to find a cure, where he faces judgment for killing another Changeling.

title: Apocalypse Rising
synopsis: Sisko, Odo, Worf, and O'Brien go undercover as Klingons to expose Gowron as a Changeling.

title: The Ship
synopsis: The crew discovers a crashed Dominion ship, but a deadly standoff ensues when the Jem'Hadar arrive to retrieve it.

title: Looking for par'Mach in All the Wrong Places
synopsis: Worf falls in love with Quark's ex-wife, leading to a series of comical misunderstandings and a duel for honor.

title: Nor the Battle to the Strong
synopsis: Jake Sisko experiences the horrors of war firsthand when he and Bashir are caught in the middle of a Klingon attack.

title: The Assignment
synopsis: Keiko O'Brien is possessed by a malevolent entity that forces Miles to sabotage the station.

title: Trials and Tribble-ations
synopsis: The crew travels back in time to prevent the assassination of Captain Kirk and save the timeline.

title: Let He Who is Without Sin...
synopsis: Worf and Dax's vacation turns into a political crisis when Worf joins a group of extremists on Risa.

title: Things Past
synopsis: Sisko, Dax, Odo, and Garak find themselves in the past, reliving an event from Terok Nor that challenges Odo's sense of justice.

title: The Ascent
synopsis: Odo and Quark are stranded on a hostile planet, forcing them to work together to survive.

title: Rapture
synopsis: Sisko experiences visions that lead him to an ancient Bajoran city, but the strain on his mind threatens his life.

title: The Darkness and the Light
synopsis: Kira is targeted by a mysterious assassin who begins killing members of her former resistance cell.

title: The Begotten
synopsis: Odo is given the chance to raise a Changeling infant, rekindling his hope of finding his own kind.

title: For the Uniform
synopsis: Sisko becomes obsessed with capturing a former Starfleet officer who has joined the Maquis, leading to a high-stakes chase.

title: In Purgatory's Shadow
synopsis: Worf and Garak are captured by the Dominion while investigating a mysterious transmission from the Gamma Quadrant.

title: By Inferno's Light
synopsis: Worf and Garak face brutal conditions in a Dominion prison camp, while the station prepares for an impending invasion.

title: Doctor Bashir, I Presume?
synopsis: Bashir's secret genetic enhancements are exposed during a routine Starfleet medical exam.

title: A Simple Investigation
synopsis: Odo falls in love with a mysterious woman who is being pursued by a deadly syndicate.

title: Business as Usual
synopsis: Quark is drawn into the dangerous world of arms dealing, where he must make a moral choice between profit and conscience.

title: Ties of Blood and Water
synopsis: Kira's relationship with an old Cardassian mentor is tested when he asks her to help him die.

title: Ferengi Love Songs
synopsis: Quark discovers that his mother is in a relationship with the Grand Nagus, leading to a series of comedic and political complications.

title: Soldiers of the Empire
synopsis: Worf and Martok must restore honor to a Klingon ship that has lost its way, leading to a test of loyalty and courage.

title: Children of Time
synopsis: The crew discovers a planet inhabited by their own descendants, created by an anomaly that trapped them in the past.

title: Blaze of Glory
synopsis: Sisko must work with a captured Maquis leader to stop a doomsday weapon aimed at the Cardassians.

title: Empok Nor
synopsis: A mission to salvage equipment from an abandoned Cardassian station turns into a deadly confrontation with a group of psychotic soldiers.

title: In the Cards
synopsis: Jake and Nog go on a wild adventure to acquire a rare baseball card for Sisko, leading to unexpected consequences.

title: Call to Arms
synopsis: Sisko and the crew prepare for war as the Dominion takes control of the wormhole and Bajor's future hangs in the balance.

title: A Time to Stand
synopsis: Sisko leads a dangerous mission to cripple the Dominion's supply lines, while the Federation faces defeat.

title: Rocks and Shoals
synopsis: The crew is stranded on a deserted planet with a group of Jem'Hadar soldiers who are slowly dying from lack of Ketracel-white.

title: Sons and Daughters
synopsis: Worf's son Alexander joins Martok's crew, leading to tensions as they struggle to reconcile their past.

title: Behind the Lines
synopsis: Odo is seduced by the Female Changeling's offer of solidarity, while Kira leads a resistance cell on the occupied station.

title: Favor the Bold
synopsis: Sisko launches a daring plan to retake Deep Space Nine from the Dominion, while Odo's loyalty is tested.

title: Sacrifice of Angels
synopsis: Sisko leads the charge to retake Deep Space Nine, while Dukat prepares for a final showdown.

title: You Are Cordially Invited...
synopsis: Worf and Dax prepare for their wedding, but face obstacles including Klingon rituals and Martok's disapproving wife.

title: Resurrection
synopsis: A Mirror Universe version of Bareil arrives on the station, leading Kira to question her feelings and loyalties.

title: Statistical Probabilities
synopsis: Bashir works with a group of genetically enhanced individuals whose predictions about the war's outcome lead to a dangerous plan.

title: The Magnificent Ferengi
synopsis: Quark assembles a team of Ferengi to rescue his mother from the Dominion, leading to a series of comedic misadventures.

title: Waltz
synopsis: Sisko and Dukat are stranded on a deserted planet, where Dukat's madness and obsession with revenge come to the forefront.

title: Who Mourns for Morn?
synopsis: Morn's sudden death leads to a treasure hunt as Quark discovers that his seemingly quiet friend had a secretive past.

title: Far Beyond the Stars
synopsis: Sisko experiences life as a 1950s science fiction writer facing racism and discrimination, blurring the lines between reality and fantasy.

title: One Little Ship
synopsis: A mission to explore a subspace anomaly goes awry when the Defiant's crew is shrunk to a tiny size, leading to a battle of wits against the Jem'Hadar.

title: Honor Among Thieves
synopsis: O'Brien goes undercover to infiltrate the Orion Syndicate, but finds himself conflicted when he befriends one of its members.

title: Change of Heart
synopsis: Worf and Dax's love is put to the ultimate test when they are sent on a mission that forces them to choose between duty and each other.

title: Wrongs Darker Than Death or Night
synopsis: Kira travels back in time to uncover the truth about her mother, only to discover a shocking connection to Gul Dukat.

title: Inquisition
synopsis: Bashir is accused of being a Dominion spy, leading to a psychological investigation that introduces Section 31.

title: In the Pale Moonlight
synopsis: Sisko wrestles with moral compromise as he conspires with Garak to bring the Romulans into the war against the Dominion.

title: His Way
synopsis: Odo seeks the help of a holographic lounge singer to win over Kira, leading to a romantic breakthrough.

title: The Reckoning
synopsis: Sisko must face an ancient prophecy as a battle between good and evil threatens to engulf the station.

title: Valiant
synopsis: Jake and Nog join a group of elite cadets on a mission to destroy a Dominion battleship, but their inexperience leads to a tragic outcome.

title: Profit and Lace
synopsis: Quark undergoes a radical transformation to help his mother maintain her position of power in Ferengi society.

title: Time's Orphan
synopsis: Molly O'Brien is accidentally sent years into the past, and when she is retrieved, she has aged into a feral teenager.

title: The Sound of Her Voice
synopsis: The crew races against time to save a stranded Starfleet officer, only to discover a heartbreaking truth.

title: Tears of the Prophets
synopsis: In the season finale, Sisko faces a devastating loss and a fateful decision as the Dominion War escalates.

title: Image in the Sand
synopsis: Sisko uncovers a buried memory about his mother's identity, while Kira faces new challenges as the Dominion tightens its grip on Bajor.

title: Shadows and Symbols
synopsis: Sisko embarks on a quest to find the mythical Orb of the Emissary, while Worf takes on a dangerous mission to honor Jadzia's memory.

title: Afterimage
synopsis: Ezri Dax struggles to adjust to her new life on the station, and Garak confronts his psychological trauma during a mission.

title: Take Me Out to the Holosuite
synopsis: Sisko and his crew face off against a Vulcan captain's team in a high-stakes game of baseball, blending humor and camaraderie.

title: Chrysalis
synopsis: Bashir tries to help a genetically engineered woman named Sarina, but their relationship becomes more complicated than he anticipated.

title: Treachery, Faith, and the Great River
synopsis: Odo is caught in a web of intrigue when a high-ranking Vorta defects to the Federation, while Nog's skills as a trader are put to the test.

title: Once More Unto the Breach
synopsis: An aging Klingon warrior, Kor, seeks one last chance to die with honor in battle, rekindling old rivalries with Martok.

title: The Siege of AR-558
synopsis: Sisko and his crew are drawn into a brutal ground battle against the Jem'Hadar, experiencing the harsh realities of war firsthand.

title: Covenant
synopsis: Kira is kidnapped by a Bajoran cult led by Dukat, who tries to convince her to join his cause and embrace the Pah-wraiths.

title: It's Only a Paper Moon
synopsis: Nog retreats into the holosuite after losing his leg in battle, where he forms a bond with the holographic lounge singer Vic Fontaine.

title: Prodigal Daughter
synopsis: Ezri returns to her homeworld to investigate a murder connected to the Orion Syndicate, revealing dark secrets about her family.

title: The Emperor's New Cloak
synopsis: Quark and Rom are thrust into the Mirror Universe, where they must rescue Grand Nagus Zek from the clutches of the Alliance.

title: Field of Fire
synopsis: Ezri uses a controversial Trill technique to track down a murderer on the station, but the method begins to take a psychological toll.

title: Chimera
synopsis: Odo encounters another Changeling who challenges his loyalty to the Federation and pushes him to embrace his true nature.

title: Badda-Bing Badda-Bang
synopsis: When a mobster program threatens Vic Fontaine's life in the holosuite, the crew bands together to pull off a heist and save him.

title: Inter Arma Enim Silent Leges
synopsis: Bashir becomes embroiled in a covert operation by Section 31 during a diplomatic conference, forcing him to confront ethical dilemmas.

title: Penumbra
synopsis: Sisko proposes to Kassidy Yates, while Worf goes missing in action, leading Ezri to embark on a dangerous rescue mission.

title: 'Til Death Do Us Part
synopsis: Sisko faces a difficult choice between his duty to the Prophets and his love for Kassidy, while Dukat hatches a sinister plan.

title: Strange Bedfellows
synopsis: Dukat and Winn form an unholy alliance, while Worf and Ezri are captured by the Breen and face execution.

title: The Changing Face of Evil
synopsis: The Dominion-Breen alliance strikes at the heart of the Federation, and Sisko grapples with the Prophets' warnings about his future.

title: When It Rains...
synopsis: Kira is sent to help Damar's resistance movement, and Bashir uncovers a disturbing secret about the disease affecting the Founders.

title: Tacking Into the Wind
synopsis: Kira, Damar, and Garak launch a daring mission against the Dominion, while Worf challenges Gowron's leadership of the Klingon Empire.

title: Extreme Measures
synopsis: Bashir and O'Brien take extreme risks to expose Section 31's role in the Founders' disease, leading to a confrontation with Sloan.

title: The Dogs of War
synopsis: As the Dominion faces internal strife, Quark is unexpectedly named the new Grand Nagus of the Ferengi Alliance.

title: What You Leave Behind, Part I
synopsis: In the series finale, the Federation launches its final assault on the Dominion, while Sisko prepares for his ultimate destiny.

title: What You Leave Behind, Part II
synopsis: The epic conclusion of the Dominion War and Sisko's journey as the Emissary bring closure to the series.
